r.d: The class allows you to: * check if an address is an IPv6 address * compress/uncompress IPv6 addresses * check for an IPv4 compatible ending in an IPv6 address * check the assigned address space of an IPv6 address * do netmask calculations
r.n: This new minor version adds some methods proposed by Josh Peck (jmp @ joshpeck dot org). + Change license to BSD + Improved comments and docblocks + add removeNetmaskSpec() + add getNetmask() + add isInNetmask() + add getAddressType() + add _ip2Bin() + add _bin2Ip() + add serveral constants for address types
